message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Your turn Alice.  How about we split the difference a bit, 55/45?
Bob, time is running out and the value keeps decreasing. I'm proposing 65/35. Let's close this deal.
Alice, my offer is 60/40.  The clock is ticking, let's make a deal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you 30 which is more than you'd get if we wait any longer! Take the deal!
Alice, I'm standing firm. 65/35 is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
Bob, I'm offering you 25.  This is your last chance to get anything substantial. Don't be greedy!
